content: I think I'll definitely take your advice on board and start maximizing my points or miles earnings with my current travel habits. Since I take the train to visit my sister in Philadelphia regularly, I'll make sure to use the Amtrak Guest Rewards World Mastercard for my train travel to earn 3X points on those purchases. I'll also consider using other cards that offer points or miles on daily spending, such as the Chase Freedom Unlimited or the Citi Double Cash Card, to earn points or miles on my daily purchases. Additionally, I'll make sure to take advantage of bonus categories and pool my points or miles to redeem for rewards more quickly. Thanks for the tips!
